lore: Combining shokk attack technology, great speed and a cheerful disregard for life and limb, the Shokkjump Dragsta provides the Orks with a vehicle that can teleport itself through – occasionally into – feet-thick fortress walls while its kustom shokk rifle bores warp tunnels right through its luckless victims.

otherAbilities.Shokk Tunnel:: Each time this model is selected to Advance , you can remove it from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.
